page.title: 03Education in Vernham Dean CP
page.content: With no schools in the area it is necessary for all the children to be bused to their school. The school being dependant upon the civil parish in which the children live. Infant and junior school children are taken to schools in Hurstbourne Tarrant, Vernham Dean, Wildhern and Chute. Secondary school children are taken to the John Hanson School in Andover, if they live in Hampshire, or to Castledown School in Lugershal, if they live in Wiltshire. Sixth form or Further Education students attend Cricklade College in Andover. In exceptional cases, e.g. courses not available at Cricklade College, the students may travel to either Salisbury or Basingstoke.
